meta.name: viewport

div.img:
Remote Learning Activated-click for schedule
No on-campus attendance!

div.style: font-size: 24px; color: black; font-weight: bold; padding: 10px 20px; border: 10px solid black;
div.p: Dear EPCHS Students and Family Members,

On 4/17/20, Governor Pritzker announced that all Illinois schools will remain closed through the end of the school year. Our students will continue to follow our Remote Learning Plan through the conclusion of the 2019-2020 school year.
We know this is difficult news. Rest assured that all EPCHS staff will continue to do all we can to support our students and families.

As we receive end-of-year procedures from the Illinois State Board of Education, will we share the information with you. Also, we will work on planning a way to recognize and celebrate our seniors. TOGETHER, we will get through this.
Remote Learning Active - No on-campus attendance​ Read More

h2.a: Postponed:You're a Good Man Charlie Brown

div.p: Performances on Friday, March 16 & Saturday, March 17 are postponed until further notice. The Senior Citizens dinner is also postponed Read More
